main event: Witnesses observed a bright red object in the sky over Wilsonville, Alabama for about 10 to 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object blinked and changed in size, appearing larger and brighter at times,The sightings were reported by three witnesses,The object moved in a straight path, indicative of an aircraft,The observers noted no sound or vapor trail associated with the object,One witness described seeing two blinking lights moving left to right in the sky.
sighted object: a bright red object in the sky
witness description: descriptions varied, but included the sight of two lights and a red luminous body
